headline: The Incredibly Shrinking Pool of Publicly Traded Companies
summary: IPOs are back in style this year. But despite some high-profile debuts, more companies are holding off on going public or are getting taken private.

raw.headline: The Incredibly Shrinking Pool of Publicly Traded Companies

headline: Market Chatter: Banco Santander-Led Banks Bear Financing Risk in Thoma Bravo-Verint Deal
summary: Banco Santander (SAN)-led banks will keep about $1.2 billion of debt from Thoma Bravo's $2.7 billion

headline: New Dayforce Podcast Makes Sense of Work – One Piece at a Time
summary: Piece of Work tackles the trends reshaping the world of workMINNEAPOLIS and TORONTO, Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dayforce, Inc. (NYSE: DAY; TSX: DAY), a global human capital management (HCM) leader that makes work life better, today announced the launch of Piece of Work, a new narrative-driven podcast diving headfirst into the issues shaping today’s workforce. Listen, follow, and subscribe on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube, and other podcast platforms. Piece of Work explores the shifts i
